Architecture
============

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

The accessCeramics Django app will use a SQL database to provide administrative
functionality for collections of ceramic Works and Images associated with those
works. It will use a Solr index to provide rich search and browse capability for
the collections.

Database
--------

As of version 0.1, accessCeramics will basically be a stock Django
application with a few database tables to track imported Ceramic Works.

Solr support will be added in an upcoming release.
